body_html:
if you are building a docker image, consider building OpenCV from source. Looks like the anaconda opencv available from the menpo channel depends on old numpy, etc.
You can find instructions to build OpenCV from source on their website.
In the future, discussions such as these can be had at https://discuss.pytorch.org
body_text:
if you are building a docker image, consider building OpenCV from source. Looks like the anaconda opencv available from the menpo channel depends on old numpy, etc.
You can find instructions to build OpenCV from source on their website.
In the future, discussions such as these can be had at https://discuss.pytorch.org
body:
if you are building a docker image, consider building OpenCV from source. Looks like the anaconda opencv available from the `menpo` channel depends on old numpy, etc. 
You can find instructions to build OpenCV from source on their website.
In the future, discussions such as these can be had at https://discuss.pytorch.org
